languages.text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 penalty, or the attack will deal only half of the damage on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Requires: Hereticus — Zealot Whenever the wielder is attacked, the attacker must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty, or the attack will deal half of the damage on hit, and the attacker will become staggered for 1 round. Base armour property: +15% armour if the wielder's Willpower is more than 70.

Requires Hereticus — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a Willpower resistance test with a −20 penalty, or the attack will deal only half of the damage on a hit and become staggered for 1 round. Base armour property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 penalty, or the attack will deal only half of the damage on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

languages.text: Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Fanático Cuando el portador sufre un ataque, el atacante debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20. De lo contrario, el ataque solo infligirá la mitad de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} al {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} y el atacante quedará {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +15 % de armadura si la Voluntad del usuario es superior a 70.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or the attack will deal only half of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Requiere Hereticus: Fanático Cuando el portador sufre un ataque, el atacante debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -20. De lo contrario, el ataque solo infligirá la mitad de daño al {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactar{/g} y el atacante quedará {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}: +15 % de armadura si la Voluntad del usuario es superior a 70.

languages.text: 需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——狂热者 每当装备者受到攻击时，攻击者必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，并在此次检定中受到-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，否则此次攻击只会造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}一半的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，攻击者还会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的意志高于70，获得+15%护甲。
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or the attack will deal only half of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 需要信念“异端主义——狂热者”。 每当装备者受到攻击时，攻击者必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，并在此次检定中受到−20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，否则此次攻击只会造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}一般的伤害，攻击者还会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{/g}轮{g|Encyclopedia:Round}。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：如果装备者的意志高于70，获得+15%护甲。

languages.text: Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Zélote. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est attaqué, l'attaquant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20, faute de quoi l'attaque n'inflige que la moitié des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} et son auteur subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'armure si la Force Mentale de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or the attack will deal only half of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Requiert Hereticus — Zélote. Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est attaqué, l'attaquant doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de -20, faute de quoi l'attaque n'inflige que la moitié des dégâts lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} et son auteur subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +15 % d'armure si la Volonté de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 70.

languages.text: Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Eiferer. Immer wenn der Träger angegriffen wird, muss der Angreifer eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Widerstands-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 bestehen. Ansonsten fügt der Angriff bei einem {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} nur die Hälfte des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} zu und der Angreifer {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelt{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % Rüstung, falls die Willenskraft des Trägers höher als 70 ist.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or the attack will deal only half of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Erfordert Haereticus — Eiferer. Wann immer der Träger angegriffen wird, muss der Angreifer eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −20 bestehen. Ansonsten fügt der Angriff bei einem {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} nur die Hälfte des Schadens zu und der Angreifer {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelt{/g} 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +15 % Rüstung, falls die Willenskraft des Trägers höher als 70 ist.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 狂信者が必要 使用者が攻撃された場合は必ず、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で受けるか、または{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を半分にして1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態になる。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の意志力が70以上の場合、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} +15%
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}, or the attack will deal only half of the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: 異端者 ― 狂信者が必要 使用者が攻撃された場合は必ず、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で受けるか、または{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}ヒット{/g}のダメージを半分にして1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろける{/g}状態になる。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：使用者の意志力が70以上の場合、アーマー +15%。

languages.text: Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — апологет Атакуя персонажа, противник выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20. В случае провала {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}атака{/g}, попавшая в цель, наносит только половину урона, а противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} на 1 раунд. Базовое свойство: +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, если значение Воли больше 70.
languages.original_text: Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Zealot. Whenever the wearer is attacked, the attacker must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} with a −20 penalty, or the attack will deal only half of the damage on a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} and become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +15% armour if the wearer's Willpower is more than 70.

traits.locale_text: Требуется: Скверна — фанатик. Атакуя персонажа, противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20. В случае провала атака, {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попавшая в цель{/g}, наносит только половину урона, а противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15% к броне, если значение Воли больше 70.

Требуется: Скверна — фанатик. Атакуя персонажа, противник выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20. В случае провала атака, {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попавшая в цель{/g}, наносит только половину урона, а противник оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +15% к броне, если значение Воли больше 70.
